titleStmt.title: Wilfull impenitency, the grossest selfe-murder all they who are guilty of it, apprehended, tryed and condemned in these sermons, preached at Rochford in Essex not long before his death / by ... Mr. William Fenner ...
titleStmt.author: Fenner, William, 1600-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.G. for Iohn Rothwell ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
